name: Shape_fromNMTest
description: Unit tests for the Shape.fromNM method in the Bloom filter implementation.

test_cases.name: testFromNM_ValidParameters
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Shape with valid parameters and verifies the number of hash functions and bits.

test_cases.name: testFromNM_InvalidNumberOfItems
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid number of items by the Shape.fromNM method.

test_cases.name: testFromNM_InvalidNumberOfBits
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid number of bits by the Shape.fromNM method.

test_cases.name: testFromNM_InvalidProbability
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of an invalid probability by the Shape.fromNM method.

test_cases.name: testFromNM_MaxValues
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Shape with maximum integer values for items and bits.

test_cases.name: testFromNM_MinValues
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Shape with minimum integer values for items and bits.
